Source: It was at the Convention of the Aedra that the land was first called “Tamriel,” which in the ancient tongues means “Dawn’s Beauty.” There are those, however, who prefer to translate it as “Starry Heart.”
The Aurbis is all the cosmos as created by Anu and Padomay. It is known as the Wheel, with Mundus as the hub and the Eight Divines as the spokes.
